import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import "../../Styles/Shared/Navbar.scss"; import logo from "../../Assets/svg/logo.svg"; import ArrowDropDownIcon from "@material-ui/icons/ArrowDropDown"; import ShoppingCartOutlinedIcon from "@material-ui/icons/ShoppingCartOutlined"; import SearchOutlinedIcon from "@material-ui/icons/SearchOutlined"; import MenuOpenOutlinedIcon from "@material-ui/icons/MenuOpenOutlined"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import SupportMenu from "./SupportMenu"; import GamesMenu from "./GamesMenu"; import CartMenu from "./CartMenu"; function Navbar() { let history = useHistory(); const [showSupportMenu, setShowSupportMenu] = useState(false); const [showGamesMenu, setShowGamesMenu] = useState(false); const [showCart, setShowCart] = useState(false); return ( <>
setShowSupportMenu(!showSupportMenu)}>
setShowGamesMenu(!showGamesMenu)}>

Games

setShowCart(!showCart)} />

  • Home
  • setShowGamesMenu(!showGamesMenu)}> Games

setShowCart(!showCart)} />
); } export default Navbar;
